snippet.title: Bear & Breakfast Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1136370/Bear_and_Breakfast 
Join Hank the bear and his forest friends as they turn a run down shack into a cozy and quaint B+B for unsuspecting tourists.

Coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch in 2021. 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1136370/Bear_and_Breakfast 
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/bear-and-breakfast-switch/
